acceptance_criteria: Windows workflow analyzed with documented results

content.self_validation_notes: Worker analyzed GitHub Actions run 22254477403. CRITICAL FINDING: Multiple PowerShell syntax errors in ralph.ps1, install.ps1, setup-notifications.ps1 make Windows non-functional despite CI showing SUCCESS. Analysis document comprehensive (6,528 bytes). Commit db053b3 in portableralph repo verified. Files copied to clawd workspace.
content.critical_findings: CI workflow produces false positives - Windows deployment completely broken
